            numeric_imputation= 'mean',

import h2o
print(h2o.__version__)
from h2o.automl import H2OAutoML

h2o.init(max_mem_size='16G')
source.051a5de9:
y = 'SalePrice'
x = [col for col in train.columns if col not in ['SalePrcie', 'Id']]
source.6c69acc9:
aml = H2OAutoML(max_models=10, seed=47, max_runtime_secs=3600)
aml.train(x=x, y=y, training_frame=train)
